mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cr.customer_tag_id) FROM call_record cr, customer_tag ct WHERE cr.customer_tag_id = ct.id AND ct.import_batch = #{importBatch} AND ct.status=#{status}
SELECT cr.* FROM call_record cr INNER JOIN customer_tag ct ON ct.id = cr.customer_tag_id AND ct.import_batch = #{importBatch} and ct.status=#{status}
SELECT DATEDIFF(cr.follow_date,now()) AS follow_day, cr.* FROM call_record cr WHERE cr.customer_tag_id = #{customerTagId} order by cr.create_time DESC
SELECT cr.* FROM call_record cr INNER JOIN customer_tag ct ON ct.id = cr.customer_tag_id AND ct.import_batch = #{importBatch} and ct.status=#{status}
